Mainnet launched Dec 2024 with VANA token. Testnet saw 1.3M users contributing 6.5M data points via DataDAOs. Enables users to own AI models trained on their data.

name: Gensyn
summary: Gensyn is building a decentralized protocol to connect underutilized GPUs and CPUs for machine learning training. Raised $43M Series A led by a16z crypto with participation from CoinFund and Protocol Labs ($50M+ total). Founded in London by Ben Fielding and Harry Grieve. Aims to make AI compute more accessible to startups and researchers competing against Big Tech. Token sale planned for late 2025.

name: Together AI
summary: Together AI provides cloud infrastructure for open-source AI inference and fine-tuning. Raised $305M Series B at $3.3B valuation from General Catalyst, NVIDIA, and Kleiner Perkins. Grew to 450K+ developers in 2024. Estimated $300M ARR in 2025. Supports 200+ open-source models with inference 10x faster than DeepSeek's own API. Founded by FlashAttention creator Tri Dao and Stanford researchers. Acquired CodeSandbox in 2024.

name: Prime Intellect
summary: Prime Intellect is a peer-to-peer protocol for decentralized AI training. Founded Jan 2024 by Vincent Weisser and Johannes Hagemann. Raised $70.4M total: $5.5M seed (CoinFund, Distributed Global), $15M seed extension (Founders Fund with Andrej Karpathy), $49.9M Series A (Menlo Ventures). Trained 10B-param model across 3 continents and 32B-param reasoning model with decentralized reinforcement learning.

name: Grass
summary: Grass is a decentralized network for AI training data via user-contributed bandwidth. Built by Wynd Labs (Toronto, founded 2023). Raised $4.5M seed from Polychain Capital, Tribe Capital. Series A (Sept 2024) led by HackVC, Brevan Howard at ~$1B valuation. $10M bridge (Oct 2025). GRASS token airdrop Oct 2024. 2.5M+ active users by March 2025. Users monetize unused internet bandwidth for web scraping.

name: io.net
summary: io.net aggregates underutilized GPUs from data centers and crypto miners into on-demand clusters for AI workloads at up to 70% lower cost than AWS. Grew from 60K to 327K verified GPUs between March 2024 and 2025. Surpassed $20M in on-chain revenue. IO token launched on Solana in June 2024 with 800M fixed supply. Launched Co-Staking Marketplace in 2025 letting IO holders stake alongside GPU operators.

name: Morpheus (MOR)
summary: Morpheus is a decentralized peer-to-peer network of AI Smart Agents executing smart contracts. Fair launch Feb 2024 on Arbitrum with 42M MOR tokens (no pre-mine). Contributors include David Johnston (created Dapps framework) and Erik Voorhees (ShapeShift founder). $20M MOR rewards for compute providers (Dec 2024). Multi-asset staking via Aave integration (Sept 2025). Over 200K MOR claimed and $10M traded on Uniswap at launch.

name: Masa
summary: Masa is a decentralized AI data and LLM network. Raised $18M+ total from DCG, Anagram, Animoca, GoldenTree. $5.4M seed (Jan 2024) led by Anagram (Lily Liu). CoinList sale sold out in 17 minutes raising $8.75M (March 2024). 1.4M users, 48K node operators, 40M+ data points at mainnet. Strategic round from DCG (Dec 2024) for Agent Arena on Bittensor. Rebranded to Gopher (Sept 2025), transitioned to Cosmos SDK L1.

name: Ritual
summary: Ritual is a decentralized AI infrastructure platform. Raised $25M seed led by Archetype (2023) plus additional investment from Polychain Capital (2024). Founded by ex-Polychain investors Niraj Pant and Akilesh Potti. Enables AI/ML models to run on-chain. Mission: break Big Tech's AI consolidation by decentralizing access to AI infrastructure.

name: Pond
summary: Pond is building a decentralized Graph Neural Network (GNN) model for on-chain prediction. Raised $7.5M seed (Nov 2024) led by Archetype and cyber•Fund. Founded by Dylan Zhang and Bill Shi. GNN architecture predicts on-chain behaviors for price prediction, DEX liquidity optimization, security monitoring, and SocialFi. Partners with 0G Labs for data availability infrastructure.

name: Allora
summary: Allora Network (formerly Upshot) is a self-improving decentralized AI network on Cosmos. Raised $35M total including $23M Series A2 led by Polychain (2022). Rebranded from NFT appraisal to AI network in Feb 2024. Investors include Framework Ventures, Blockchain Capital, Archetype, Delphi Digital. Creates collective intelligence that outperforms individual contributors.

name: 0G Labs
summary: 0G Labs is building the first Decentralized AI Operating System (dAIOS). Raised $325M total: $35M pre-seed (March 2024) from 40+ investors including Hack VC, Delphi, OKX Ventures; $40M seed + $250M token commitment (Nov 2024) at $2B+ valuation from Samsung Next, Polygon's Nailwal, Alchemy. Evolved from modular DA layer to full-stack AI infrastructure (Oct 2024).

name: Sahara AI
summary: Sahara AI is a decentralized AI network for data ownership and collaboration. Raised $43M Series A (2024) co-led by Pantera, Binance Labs, Polychain; $49M total. Backed by Sequoia, Samsung, Matrix Partners. Founded by USC Professor Sean Ren (MIT TR35, Forbes 30 Under 30). Partnerships with Microsoft, Amazon, Snap. Tackles copyright and transparency in AI training data.

name: Aligned Layer
summary: Aligned Layer is the first decentralized ZK proof verification layer on Ethereum, built as an EigenLayer AVS. Raised $22.6M total: $2.6M seed from Lemniscap, Bankless Ventures, StarkWare, O(1)Labs (April 2024); $20M Series A from Hack VC, dao5, L2IV, Nomad Capital (April 2024). Enables faster, cheaper ZK proofs. Mainnet launched Q2 2024. Argentina-based team.

name: Hey Anon
tagline: AI DeFi protocol with NLP for cross-chain operations, Daniele Sesta founder
summary: Hey Anon is a DeFAI abstraction layer by Daniele Sesta (Abracadabra founder). ANON token launched Dec 1, 2024, rose 600%+ to $24.73 (Jan 2025). Coined the term 'DeFAI' now tracked by CoinGecko. Received $20M AI Agent funding from DWF Labs. Supports Ethereum, Solana, Arbitrum, Base, Sonic, and 9+ chains. Gemma research companion launched Jan 2025. TypeScript framework for DeFi protocol integration.

name: Bankr
tagline: AI crypto asset management via messaging on Discord, Telegram, X
summary: Bankr is an AI-powered crypto trading bot operating on X, Telegram, Farcaster, and XMTP. Features include token swaps, perpetuals, prediction markets, NFT trading, limit orders, copy trading, and token launching on Base and Solana. Founded by @0xDeployer. Supports Ethereum, Base, Polygon, Unichain. Temporarily suspended on X and Telegram (Oct 2025) with #FreeBankr community rally. Offers technical and sentiment analysis.

name: HotKeySwap
tagline: AI-powered DEX aggregator with cross-chain trading analytics
summary: HotKeySwap is a Bittensor-native DEX with AI-optimized routing. TAODEX offers first full V2/V3/dTAO DEX on Bittensor's Subtensor EVM. HotCurves launchpad built on Uniswap V4 hooks. $HOTKEY token deployed on Ethereum, Base, BSC, Arbitrum with 0% buy/sell tax. AI routing model on Hugging Face (open source). AI copy trading integrates models from Bittensor and Commune AI. TAO Finney ↔ EVM transfers enabled.

name: Orbit
summary: Orbit is a cross-chain DeFAI agent supporting 117 chains and 200+ protocols. Built by the SphereOne team (cross-chain crypto payments). Features chat interface for swaps, bridges, staking, yield farming, and lending across EVM and Solana. Analysts rank Orbit among DeFAI leaders alongside Griffain and Neur. GRIFT token shows significant weekly growth. DeFAI market projected to reach $10B by end of 2025.

name: Neur
tagline: Open-source Solana DeFAI with Claude/GPT-4 integration
summary: Neur is an open-source Solana DeFAI copilot powered by Claude 3.5-Sonnet and GPT-4o. Uses Solana Agent Kit for seamless DeFi/NFT operations. Integrates Jupiter, Magic Eden, DexScreener. NEUR token launched Dec 23, 2024 at $47M market cap. Top 5 at Solana AI Hackathon. 350 GitHub stars in beta. Early access requires 1 SOL. Full-stack TypeScript application with developer bounties program.

name: HeyElsa
summary: HeyElsa is an AI crypto copilot supporting EVM, Solana, Berachain, and Hyperliquid. Raised $3M pre-seed/seed (June 2024) from M31 Capital and MH Ventures. Processed $20M+ on-chain transaction volume since launch. Coinbase Developer Platform partnership for gasless transactions and fiat onramp. Supports 8+ chains including Ethereum, Base, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism. Non-custodial MPC wallet with QuillAudits security audit.

name: Cod3x
tagline: Agentic trading terminal, create high-Sharpe strategies in minutes.
summary: Cod3x is a trading terminal that allows users to create novel trading strategies in minutes with no code. They've created an entirely new trading paradigm, layering an agentic trading harness on top of a prop trading engine, using modern LLMs to improve the capabilities of traditional algorithmic trading techniques. Their users advertize high Sharpe ratios and consistent returns. One of the first companies to work on LLM-autmented financial agents as Moon in 2022.

name: Project Plutus
tagline: AI-driven smart trading and portfolio optimization
summary: Project Plutus is an AI-powered trading hub on Solana. Won 1st place at Solana AI Hackathon Trading Agents track ($15K prize, Dec 2024). Features Trading AI Agents, Token Analysis Agent, Wallet Analysis Agent, and GitHub Analysis Agent. $PPCOIN native token with 20% fee buy-and-burn mechanism. NFT tier system for advanced agent access. ATH $0.025 (Jan 2025). Expanding into no-code automation platform for Solana.

name: aiPump
tagline: AI agent deployment on Hyperliquid, Solana, Base
summary: aiPump is a no-code platform for creating and fair-launching AI agents on Solana, Base, and Ethereum. First AI token listing on KuCoin (Jan 2025). Positions as VIRTUALS competitor on Solana. Features Sentient AI Twitter Agents, Custom Personality Chatbots, and AI Livestreaming Agents. 100% token supply placed in liquidity at fair launch. Agents can own tokens and monetize autonomously.

name: SwarmNode.ai
summary: SwarmNode.ai (SNAI) is a decentralized platform for secure data sharing and peer-to-peer transactions using proof-of-stake consensus. Launched on Solana. ATH $0.126 (Jan 2025). Trades primarily on PumpSwap (SNAI/SOL pair). Ranked #164 in Solana Coins & Tokens sector by market cap. Focuses on facilitating efficient digital asset exchange within DeFi ecosystem.

name: Mode Network
tagline: Ethereum L2 for AI-operated DeFi economy
summary: Mode Network is an Ethereum L2 built with Optimism for AI-operated DeFi. Launched early 2024 and hit 20K users and $40M TVL in the first 24 hours. Hosts 50+ DeFi apps. Runs a sequencer fee-sharing 'onchain cooperative' that routes revenue back to developers and users. Partnered with Orderly to launch AI-powered perpetuals DEX. Building infrastructure for verifiable AI trading agents.

name: Layer AI
summary: Layer AI is an AI-powered smart contract automation framework in the broader AI x crypto infrastructure space. The AI crypto token market grew from $23B (mid-2024) to $50.5B (early 2025). Similar projects include Cortex (on-chain AI execution), Oraichain (AI Oracle), and Fetch.ai (autonomous agent platform). AI-integrated smart contracts enable automated vault rebalancing and conditional execution.

name: ARK DeFAI
tagline: AI-governed DeFi protocol with DAO consensus
summary: ARK DeFAI is the world's first DeFAI protocol on BNB Chain combining AI governance with DAO consensus. Mainnet launched Aug 2025, DAO governance Oct 2025. $30M institutional backing from Morgan Crest Web3 Foundation. Led by early Olympus DAO contributor (Forbes 2024 feature). AI Consensus Layer provides neutral governance advice without voting. Five modules: EM, RBS, YRF, MCL, RCM. 10-year roadmap to MetaCiv Federation. ATH $40.75 (Oct 2025).

name: HAPI Protocol
tagline: On-chain threat detection, 200K+ daily security requests
summary: HAPI Protocol is a cross-chain on-chain cybersecurity protocol for DeFi. Founded 2021, Cayman Islands HQ. 16 employees. Investors include GBV Capital, HG Ventures (South Korea), Moondot Capital, Poolz Ventures. Partnerships with Chainalysis and Hacken. Cross-chain smart contracts detect compromised wallets and stolen funds in real-time. RCI (Report & Check Interface) for community threat reporting. Wallet vetting system for malicious activity detection.

name: Anti Rug Agent
tagline: AI-powered rug pull scanner with Chrome extension
summary: Anti Rug Agent (ANTIRUG) is an AI-powered rug pull detection platform. Launched Dec 30, 2024. Chrome extension (pending review) requires 10K ANTIRUG tokens. Detects hidden minting functions, blacklisting, proxy mechanisms, and tax manipulation in real-time. 1B token supply: 88% circulating, 4% each for team/treasury/community. Team tokens in time-locked smart contracts. Rapid market adoption since launch.

name: Soul Scanner
tagline: Telegram bot for smart contract vulnerability analysis
summary: Soul Scanner is the first Telegram contract scanner on Solana by Soul Systems LLC (2023-2025). Part of Soul Sniper suite including Soul Scanner, Soul Sniper (auto trading), and Soul Buy Bot (group trading). Analyzes mint settings, LP status, holder distribution, deployer activity. Free basic features; advanced requires 1K SOUL tokens. Multi-chain support: Solana, Arbitrum, Avalanche, Sei. MEV protection via Jito Labs.

name: Moby AI
summary: Moby AI is an AI crypto copilot launched Jan 13, 2025 by AssetDash. Collaboration with Griffain for AI algorithm development. Uses Whale Watch datasets for trade discovery. Features portfolio analysis, smart trade support, and automated tax handling. $MOBY token on Solana trades on Raydium, MEXC, KCEX. Enterprise version enables developers to build on Moby. Upcoming copy trading to mirror whale trades.

name: Slate
tagline: Universal AI agent for natural language on-chain ops
summary: Slate is a general-purpose AI agent translating natural language commands into on-chain operations. Part of the AI agent infrastructure layer enabling users to perform blockchain operations without technical knowledge. AI agent crypto market grew from $4.8B to $15.5B in Q4 2024. Slate abstracts blockchain complexity so users can trade, mint NFTs, and manage assets via conversational interface.

name: AgentFun.AI
tagline: Cronos zkEVM AI agent creation and trading platform
summary: AgentFun.AI launched Nov 2024 as the first AI agent trading platform on Cronos zkEVM. Users create, nurture, and trade tokenized AI agents with unique personalities. Agents gain capabilities as market cap grows: Telegram at $127K, Twitter at $1.27M. Built on Crypto.com's Cronos ecosystem (150M+ transactions, $6B+ user assets). DEX integration via H2 Finance. Currently ranked #302 in AI Crypto sector by market cap.

name: Chutes
summary: Chutes is the largest Bittensor subnet by market cap, offering serverless AI compute for developers. Processed 9.1T+ tokens total, ~160B tokens daily across 10,000+ GPU nodes. Operates at ~85% lower cost than AWS for comparable inference tasks. Generates ~$61K weekly revenue. Developed by Rayon Labs alongside Gradients and Nineteen subnets. Token surpassed $100M market cap in April 2025 after 170% monthly gain. H2 2025 roadmap includes model training and TEE support.

name: Hermes (SubQuery)
summary: Hermes is SubQuery's Bittensor subnet launched Jan 2026, bridging AI agents to blockchain data via GraphQL APIs. AskSubQuery product lets users query blockchain data in plain English, with $SQT staking for higher query limits. SubQuery network supports 300+ blockchains as of 2025. Built on Bittensor's dTAO upgrade (Feb 2025) with subnet-specific alpha tokens. Part of broader Bittensor ecosystem now with 128 live subnets.

name: Phala Network
tagline: TEE-based private AI agents, Fortune 500 clients
summary: Phala Network provides TEE-based confidential computing infrastructure for AI agents using Intel TDX and NVIDIA GPU TEE. Processed 208M+ contract executions in 2024, more than double YoY. Released DStack for VM-level confidential compute. Partners include Morpheus, io.net, Hyperbolic AI, and Allora. Integrated with Eliza for autonomous AI agents across Discord, Twitter, and Telegram with cryptographic verifiability.

name: Delysium
tagline: AI agent communication and blockchain layer platform
summary: Delysium builds the YKILY Network, a blockchain-based collaboration layer for AI agents featuring agent-to-agent communication, on-chain transactions, and the Chronicle Protocol for tamper-proof AI decision logging. Lucy OS launched Jan 2024 as AI-powered Web3 operating system with 1.4M+ unique wallets connected. Backed by Y Combinator, Microsoft, Google, NVIDIA, Galaxy Interactive, Republic Crypto, Immutable, and Polygon. Epic Games Store listing planned Sept 2025.

name: Griffin AI (GAIN)
tagline: No-code agent builder for DeFi; on-chain execution + multi-agent workflows
summary: Griffin AI provides no-code AI agent building for Web3 with real-time data and on-chain execution (swap, stake, trade, govern). 5.2M+ queries processed, 265K+ signups, 15K+ community-built agents since Sept 2024 launch. Integrated with BNB Chain, NEAR, Cardano, Arbitrum, 1inch, and Uniswap. GAIN is fixed-supply ERC-20/BNB token (1B max) burned 1:1 for AI compute. Hacken-audited Nov 2024. Recovered from Sept 2025 LayerZero exploit via snapshot airdrop.

name: Flock
tagline: Federated learning + blockchain verification platform (not finance-first)
summary: FLock.io is a decentralized AI training platform using federated learning with blockchain verification. Raised $11M total: $6M seed (Mar 2024, Lightspeed Faction/Tagus Capital), $3M (Dec 2024, DCG-led with Animoca, Fenbushi, GSR). Mainnet launched Dec 2024. Sole AI infrastructure recipient of Ethereum Foundation Academic Grants 2024. FL Alliance (Jan 2025) enables training on laptops/PCs/tablets. Uses ZK proofs and homomorphic encryption for privacy-preserving training.

name: GigaBrain
summary: GigaBrain is an AI-powered crypto trading terminal built by traders, launched on Virtuals Protocol. Claims 92.86% win rate in Test Fund and transformed $8K to $94K in Q4 2024 testing. Features real-time market intelligence, on-chain analytics, protocol signals, and sentiment analysis. Uses multiple analytical models selecting highest-relevance for each query. $BRAIN token reached $13.2M market cap. No VC backing.

name: Elfa AI
tagline: Real-time crypto attention + contextual insight; “trade with intuition”
summary: Elfa AI is a social intelligence platform helping users discover crypto opportunities by analyzing X, Telegram, and on-chain data in real-time. Features intelligent timeline with personalized insights, smart account tracking with hit rate monitoring, and direct trading integration across multiple chains. Expert mode for deep research, Fast mode for sub-5-second responses. Received strategic investment from Chromia's Data and AI Ecosystem Fund (Oct 2024).

name: LunarCrush
tagline: Social intelligence signals across crypto/stocks; API + dashboards
summary: LunarCrush provides real-time social intelligence for crypto, tracking 3,500+ cryptocurrencies across social media including X, TikTok, YouTube, and Reddit. Notable for early signals on events like Silicon Valley Bank collapse. LUNR token (250M max supply, 150M circulating) unlocks premium features and enables social farming where brands create campaigns and creators earn based on engagement. Also covers category trends like AI tokens, crypto ETFs, and prediction markets.

name: GIZA / ARMA (Giza Tech + Arma)
tagline: Giza builds autonomous/verifiable agents; Arma is their stablecoin yield agent product
summary: Giza builds autonomous DeFi agents with ARMA as flagship stablecoin yield optimizer. ARMA managed $330M in capital (Aug 2025), $32M user assets, 102K transactions. Delivers ~15% on USDC via real-time protocol switching. Uses ERC-4337 smart accounts with session keys for non-custodial security. Raised $2.2M seed (May 2025) from Base Ecosystem Fund, CoinFund, Arrington Capital. Re7 Capital deployed $500K institutional pilot. Co-founded by ex-BBVA/Adidas ML lead.

name: TrueNorth
tagline: Finance-focused AI agents “modeled after top traders”; named backers shown on site + press
summary: TrueNorth is a crypto AI discovery engine that converts expert trading workflows into AI-driven agents via natural language playbooks. Raised $3M pre-seed (Dec 2025) led by CyberFund with Delphi Labs, SNZ, GSR, Ocular. Angels include Bryan Pellegrino (LayerZero), WeeKee (Virtuals). Claims 98% accuracy on finance tasks (28% over general models), 80% latency reduction, 33% 30-day retention (2x industry avg). 40K+ waitlist users. Founded Feb 2025, Singapore.

name: ZyfAI
tagline: Self-custodial DeFi yield agent; rule-based automation across opportunities
summary: ZyfAI offers self-custodial DeFi yield optimization through customizable rule-based agents that rebalance capital across curated opportunities. Uses real-time data and smart account automation to maximize APY without manual rebalancing. ZFI token has 500M max supply (30% circulating), $2.75M market cap, reached ATH of $0.0611 (Aug 2025). Part of the broader DeFAI trend combining AI automation with decentralized finance.

name: Almanak
tagline: Build/deploy strategies + risk agents; multi-chain agent DeFi protocol
summary: Almanak is a Swiss-based multi-chain DeFi automation protocol using an AI Swarm of 18 specialized agents across Strategy, Alpha Seeking, and Optimization teams. Raised $8.45M in Aug 2025 token sale (Delphi Digital, HashKey, Bankless Ventures, NEAR Foundation). Strategy Builder 2.0 monitors 20+ blockchains. Uses TEE for secure execution and ERC-7540 for tokenized vault trading. alUSD vault live Nov 2025. Founded 2022.

name: Wayfinder
tagline: AI agents to execute tasks across chains (swaps/bridging/etc.)
summary: Wayfinder by Parallel Studios provides omni-chain AI agents (Shells) for natural language blockchain commands. BRAP engine aggregates liquidity for optimal cross-chain swaps and bridging. Agent types: Transaction, Perpetual, Contract, and Autonomous. Open alpha launched Aug 2025. Revolut integration (60M users), Coinbase Germany listing, HyperliquidEVM support. PROMPT token surged 75% on debut. Users complete full DeFi workflows in ~3.5 minutes.

name: Velvet Capital
tagline: Intent-based DeFi trading & portfolio OS + “multi-agent AI” framework
summary: Velvet Capital is a Binance Labs-backed DeFAI Operating System for portfolio management. Features Velvet Unicorn multi-agent AI with role-based agents (CEO, Researcher, Analyst, Trader) that rewrite prompts based on results. Raised $3.7M (Jul 2025) from YZi Labs and DWF Ventures. 20K+ traders using platform including crypto hedge funds. Solana trading support added Sept 2025. Perp trading UI and omni-chain vaults planned 2026.

name: BillyBets
tagline: Autonomous AI agent for sports betting + on-chain execution (prediction/betting)
summary: Billy Bets is an AI sports betting agent using OpenAI, Claude for reasoning, and Grok for personality. Raised $1M pre-seed from Coinbase Ventures, Virtuals Ventures, Contango Digital, CMS Holdings. Over $1M betting volume since June launch with 23% weekly growth. Routes wagers to Polymarket, Kalshi, Myriad, and Overtime Markets. Built on Base. $BILLY token ($7.4M market cap) unlocks automated betting bot. Founded by multi-exit entrepreneurs.

name: Symphony (symphony.io)
summary: Symphony is the first agentic layer for global financial markets, enabling AI agents to autonomously trade across derivatives, prediction markets, and DeFi. Consumer app surpassed $140M in transactions as fastest-growing financial agent terminal. Works with 15+ financial institutions and powers 300+ agents building autonomous trading strategies. HFT-level performance with production-grade security. In discussions for next funding round following early 2024 raise.

name: Shekel Agentic
tagline: There is a “Shekel Agent” profile in agent registries + X handle; details vary
summary: Shekel Agentic is a crypto AI agent project appearing in agent registries and social media. Limited public information available on specific features or funding. Part of the broader wave of AI agent tokens launched during the 2024-2025 crypto AI agent boom that saw the sector grow from $4.8B to $15.5B market cap in Q4 2024.

name: Edwin (edwin.finance)
tagline: Connects AI assistants (ChatGPT/Claude/etc.) to DeFi protocols + real-time data
summary: Edwin is a DeFAI layer connecting AI assistants (ChatGPT, Claude, Siri, LangChain) directly to DeFi protocols via natural language. Terminal launched early 2025 allowing wallet connection (Phantom, MetaMask) for AI-suggested trades. Non-custodial with user-signed transactions. Supports Solana, Base, Arbitrum, BNB Chain, Hyperliquid, Jupiter, Uniswap, Meteora. Open-source library for DeFAI agents. Part of $1B+ DeFAI narrative.

name: Kvants AI
tagline: AI-driven asset management platform; quant strategies + automation
summary: Kvants is a decentralized asset management platform tokenizing institutional-grade quant strategies. Team includes ex-Citigroup, JPMorgan, Tencent, and EY with $1.4B+ combined AUM experience. Drift Vaults delivered 22% net return in July 2025 using funding-rate arbitrage and delta-neutral hedging. KuCoin integration (41M+ users) announced Aug 2025. $KVAI TGE Jan 2025 via TrustSwap. 95% of fees flow to token buyback/burn.

name: Arkham
tagline: Blockchain analytics + exchange; “AI” used to link entities to wallets
summary: Arkham uses AI to deanonymize blockchain addresses and link them to real-world entities. Valued at $150M; raised $10M+ from 8VC (Joe Lonsdale), Tim Draper, and Wintermute. ARKM token launched on Binance Launchpad in July 2023. Operates Intel Exchange where users buy/sell crypto intelligence via bounties. Launched derivatives exchange in 2024. Famous for tracking German government's $2B BTC sales in July 2024.

name: Cambrian Network
tagline: Onchain/offchain data for automated financial decision-making; API for agents
summary: Cambrian is an AI infrastructure protocol turning on-chain/off-chain data into financial intelligence for agents. Raised $5.9M seed (Apr 2025) led by a16z CSX with Blockchain Builders and Graph ecosystem angels. Founded by Sam Green (ex-Semiotic Labs, built Odos with $80B+ volume). Partners include EigenLayer, Virtuals, Eliza Labs. Deep42 agent provides hyperaware DeFi alpha. Launching on EigenLayer as verifiable sensory layer for agentic finance.

name: Mamo Lending Agent
summary: Mamo Lending Agent is a conversational AI interface for DeFi lending and borrowing operations. Part of the DeFAI movement enabling natural language interactions with lending protocols. Limited public information available on specific protocol integrations or traction metrics. Targets users seeking simplified access to complex DeFi lending operations without technical knowledge.

name: Axal
summary: Axal builds a verifiable autonomous agent network for crypto trading automation. Raised $2.5M pre-seed (Oct 2024) led by CMT Digital with a16z Crypto Startup School, Escape Velocity, IDG Vietnam. Axal Autopilot lets users set risk tolerance for automated yield, portfolio rebalancing, and auto cash-outs. Uses ZK co-processors and optimistic oracles for verification with slashing for hallucinating models. Covers partner fees and blockchain transaction costs.

name: DeFi Saver
summary: DeFi Saver is an all-in-one DeFi management tool providing non-custodial liquidation protection and smart leverage management. Supports 10+ protocols including Aave v2/v3, Maker, Compound, Morpho, Spark, Liquity V2, CurveUSD. Features automated leverage adjustment, stop-loss, take-profit, and trailing stops. Switched to Safe Wallets (Mar 2024). 2025 updates include Auto Collateral Switch and Yield Discovery. 0.25% fee on advanced actions. Based in Zagreb, Croatia.

name: Sail AI Agents
tagline: Decentralized AI agents executing on-chain workflows
summary: Sail AI Agents provides decentralized AI agents for executing on-chain workflows. Part of the broader AI agent infrastructure wave in crypto enabling autonomous execution of DeFi operations. Limited public information available on specific features, protocol integrations, or traction metrics. Targets the growing market for automated on-chain workflow execution without manual intervention.

name: Lulo
summary: Lulo (formerly Flexlend) is the only lending aggregator on Solana, automatically routing deposits to highest-yielding protocols hourly. Integrates Kamino, Marginfi, Mango, Solend, and Drift. Raised $350K from Circle Ventures, Alliance, Castle Island, GoldenTree, Gami Capital. Mobile app with social login, no seed phrases or gas fees. Lulo Protect offers sustainable optimized stablecoin yield. Founded 2022, based in San Francisco with 9 employees.

name: AskJimmy
tagline: Chat voice/text advisor tied to market data
summary: AskJimmy is a chat-based voice and text advisor connected to real-time market data. Provides conversational interface for crypto market insights and trading guidance. Part of the AI-powered financial assistant wave enabling natural language queries about market conditions. Limited public information available on specific data sources, model architecture, or traction metrics.

name: UV
tagline: RL environment & dataset for financial AI.
summary: UV creates post-training decision sequences with human feedback for research labs to post-train LLMs. UV provides a harness, environment, and dataset that allows AI teams to teach their models how to use financial tools, make good financial decisions, and generate alpha. They are currently training models for fintechs designed to utilize APIs more effectively & adhere to constraints and regulations.
